name: Street Fighter VI 12 Peoples
summary: An unlicensed port of snes version of Street Fighter on nes. Developed by Cony Soft, this version removes Dhalsim and Zangief from the roster, possibly so the game uses less space. The title screen appears different compared to the previous versions and the game has a later copyright date, but other than that, it remains the same as the 16 Peoples version.
